articles.description: England suffer a record defeat at the hands of world champions Australia in Las Vegas as Tamika Upton scores five of their 17 tries.
articles.title: Australia 90-4 England: Lionesses suffer record defeat in Las Vegas

articles.description: Julian Alvarez scores his 10th league goal of the season to help Atletico Madrid beat Athletic Bilbao and move top of La Liga.
articles.title: Atletico Madrid 1-0 Athletic Bilbao: Julian Alvarez hits winner to take side top

articles.description: The Brazil forward was sent off late in extra time as Wolves were knocked out of the FA Cup by Bournemouth on penalties. But how costly will his dismissal be for the club's Premier League survival?
articles.title: Matheus Cunha: How costly will forward's red card prove for Wolves?

articles.description: A familiar white-ball defeat for England in Karachi must mark the start of their rebuild, writes Matthew Henry.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: England's defeat in Karachi should mark start of rebuild

articles.description: Belfast's Lewis Crocker wins a hugely dramatic IBF eliminator against Paddy Donovan after his opponent is disqualified for delivering a punch after the bell at the end of the eighth round at the SSE Arena.
articles.title: Lewis Crocker v Paddy Donovan: Belfast fighter awarded wins chaotic fight via disqualification

articles.description: Super League champions Wigan underline their credentials as serious title contenders again this season with an impressive win over Warrington in Las Vegas.
articles.title: Super League: Wigan Warriors 48-24 Warrington Wolves

articles.description: A goalkeeper holding the ball for more than eight seconds will be punished with a corner for the opposition from this summer.
articles.title: Eight-second law: New law to tackle goalkeeper time-wasting introduced

articles.description: Celtic move to within three wins away of retaining the Scottish Premiership crown after seeing off St Mirren in a seven-goal classic in Paisley to extend their lead at the top of the table to 16 points.
articles.title: Celtic beat St Mirren 5-2 to extend Scottish Premiership lead

articles.description: Clubs pay tribute to Spanish midfielder Nico Hidalgo, who has died aged 32 after being diagnosed with lung cancer.
articles.title: Nico Hidalgo: Clubs pay tribute after Spanish midfielder dies of lung cancer aged 32

articles.description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says he and the club's board have a "vision" showing a "clear path" to a better future, on and off the pitch.
articles.title: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim says club on clear path to better future
